Answer.label: Answer
Answer.description: An answer to a question with provenance tracking

Briefing.label: Briefing

data_hash.description: Hash of project data at time of generation

Briefing.description: A daily briefing summarizing project status and insights

Conversation.label: Conversation
Conversation.description: A chat conversation or message thread

Email.label: Email

body_text.description: Plain text body of the email

date_sent.description: Date and time the email was sent

thread_id.description: Email thread identifier for grouping conversations

response_drafted.description: Whether a draft response has been generated

requires_response.description: Whether this email needs a response

Email.description: An email message with extracted entities and response tracking

Fact.label: Fact
Fact.description: A piece of knowledge or information

Person.label: Person
Person.description: A person or individual in the system

Project Management Tool.description: New entity type detected: Project Management Tool

Question.label: Question
Question.description: A question or inquiry requiring an answer

Team.description: Entity type "Team" exists in graph (1 nodes) but not in ontology

Contact.description: Entity type "Contact" exists in graph (37 nodes) but not in ontology

ANSWER_FROM.label: Answer From
ANSWER_FROM.description: Answer was derived from a document or fact

ANSWERED_BY.label: Answered By
ANSWERED_BY.description: Question was answered by a person

ASSIGNED_TO.label: Assigned To
ASSIGNED_TO.description: Task is assigned to a person

BRIEFING_FOR.label: Briefing For
BRIEFING_FOR.description: Briefing was generated for a project

COMPLIES_WITH.description: New relationship type: ACMEA → Dutch Pension Law

CONTACT_PERSON.label: Contact Person
CONTACT_PERSON.description: Person is a contact for a client

DEPENDS_ON.label: Depends On
DEPENDS_ON.description: Task or technology depends on another

DISCUSSED.description: New relationship type: Afonso → Dutch pension law

EMAIL_ANSWERS.label: Email Answers
EMAIL_ANSWERS.description: Email provides an answer to a question

EMAIL_MENTIONS.label: Email Mentions
EMAIL_MENTIONS.description: Email mentions a person in its content

EMAIL_REFERENCES.label: Email References
EMAIL_REFERENCES.description: Email references a document or other entity

EXTRACTED_FROM.label: Extracted From
EXTRACTED_FROM.description: Fact was extracted from a document or meeting

IDENTIFIED_IN.label: Identified In
IDENTIFIED_IN.description: Risk was identified in a project or meeting

INTEGRATES.description: New relationship type: ACHMEA → Dutch Pension Law

INTEGRATES_WITH.description: New relationship type: ACHMEA → Dutch Pension Law

INTRODUCED.description: New relationship type: Luuc CGI → Kishor CGI

MADE_BY.label: Made By
MADE_BY.description: Decision was made by a person

MADE_IN.label: Made In
MADE_IN.description: Decision was made in a meeting

MENTIONED_IN.description: Relation type "MENTIONED_IN" exists in graph (38 edges) but not in ontology

OWNED_BY.label: Owned By
OWNED_BY.description: Risk is owned by a person

OWNS.description: Relation type "OWNS" exists in graph (7 edges) but not in ontology

PART_OF.label: Part Of
PART_OF.description: Task is part of a project

message_count.description: Number of messages from this person

PARTICIPATED_IN.description: Relation type "PARTICIPATED_IN" exists in graph (33 edges) but not in ontology

PARTICIPATES_IN.label: Participates In
PARTICIPATES_IN.description: Person participates in a project (cross-graph reference)

QUESTION_ABOUT.label: Question About
QUESTION_ABOUT.description: Question is about a specific topic/entity

QUESTION_ASSIGNED_TO.label: Question Assigned To
QUESTION_ASSIGNED_TO.description: Question is assigned to a person to answer

QUESTION_FROM_DOCUMENT.label: Question From Document
QUESTION_FROM_DOCUMENT.description: Question was extracted from a document

REFERENCES.label: References
REFERENCES.description: Document references another document or entity

REPLIES_TO.label: Replies To
REPLIES_TO.description: Email is a reply to another email (threading)

RESULTED_IN.label: Resulted In
RESULTED_IN.description: Meeting resulted in a decision or task

SENT_BY.label: Sent By
SENT_BY.description: Email was sent by a person

SENT_TO.label: Sent To
SENT_TO.description: Email was sent to a person

USED_IN.label: Used In

purpose.description: What the tech is used for

USED_IN.description: Technology is used in a project (cross-graph reference)

USES.description: New relationship type: ACHA Project → Knowledge Graph

purpose.description: What the tech is used for

role.description: Job title or role at the organization

WORKS_WITH.description: Relation type "WORKS_WITH" exists in graph (63 edges) but not in ontology

answered_questions.cypher: MATCH (q:Question)-[:ANSWERED_BY]->(p:Person) WHERE q.status = 'resolved' RETURN q, p

followup_questions.cypher: MATCH (q1:Question)-[:HAS_FOLLOWUP]->(q2:Question) WHERE q1.content CONTAINS $question RETURN q2

meetings_about.cypher: MATCH (m:Meeting)-[:ABOUT_PROJECT]->(proj:Project {name: $project}) RETURN m ORDER BY m.date DESC

pending_questions.cypher: MATCH (q:Question) WHERE q.status = 'pending' RETURN q ORDER BY q.priority DESC

project_connections.cypher: MATCH (p:Person) WHERE size(p.projects) > 1 RETURN p.name, p.projects

questions_about_topic.cypher: MATCH (q:Question)-[:QUESTION_ABOUT]->(t) WHERE t.name CONTAINS $topic OR t.content CONTAINS $topic RETURN q

who_answered.cypher: MATCH (q:Question)-[:ANSWERED_BY]->(p:Person) WHERE q.content CONTAINS $question RETURN p, q.answer
